verbose_text: These results, together with the capacity of the anti-A3 domain monovalent antibody to block the binding of ULVWF multimers to C3 protein, indicate that the A3 domain in the A1A2A3 complex of ULVWF multimers serves as the docking site where C3 binds and initiates the assembly and activation of the AP.
evidence: anti-A3 domain monovalent antibody to block the binding of ULVWF multimers
